name: IOUserAudioStereoPanControl
desc: A control object that supports panning between stereo channels.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Allocates and initializes an instance of the stereo pan control class.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes an instance of a stereo pan control.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - GetBaseClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the base class object.

items.name: - HandleChangeControlValue
items.desc: Tells the stereo pan control the value is changing.

items.name: - SetControlValue
items.desc: Sets the stereo pan value of the control.

items.name: - GetControlValue
items.desc: Gets the floating-point stereo pan value of the control.

items.name: - SetPanningChannels
items.desc: Sets the current stereo panning channels.

items.name: - GetPanningChannels
items.desc: Gets the current stereo panning channels.
